mapper.select: /*获取客户角色*/ select sur.user_id,su.mobile,su.create_time,su.status, pcu.address,pcu.company_name,pcu.contect_name from system_role sr left join system_user_role sur on sr.id = sur.role_id left join system_users su on sur.user_id = su.id left join pro_cus_user pcu on su.id = pcu.user_id where sr.name = "客户角色"
